description.name: description
description.value:
The link in *"See the most recently published version of this document"* in the Introduction for Zend_Session does not seem to be working. It links to the following URL:

[http://framework.zend.com/wiki/x/iVc]

Which gives a System Error, stating the following:

{quote}
java.lang.IllegalStateException
 at org.apache.catalina.connector.ResponseFacade.sendError(ResponseFacade.java:404)

value.name: Zend_Session
value.description: A standardized interface to common functionality found in or indigenous to site session implementations.

value.body: Already resolved with [SVN r9117|http://framework.zend.com/fisheye/changelog/Zend_Framework/?cs=9117]. The website should be updated with a new build of the documentation by no later than the next release.
Changing to comply with new IT coventions for components.
